full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE @005A *, ,GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GA RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I BZLOG BSGYUR ZUR BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYING PA DANG, SNGA MA NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMYON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GIS RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHO GA BAR, RANG DANG BSKAL BA MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYE BA'I SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN MONG SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYI BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN PA SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,)
